Class.ClassComment:
ResultSetStatistics /** * The ResultSetStatistics interface is used to provide run time statistics information on a specific ResultSet.

This interface extends Formatable so that all objects which implement this interface can be easily saved to the database. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Return the statement execution plan as a String. * @param depth Indentation level. * @return String The statement execution plan as a String. */

/** * Return information on the scan nodes from the statement execution plan as a String. * @param depth Indentation level. * @param tableName if not NULL then return information for this table only * @return String The information on the scan nodes from the statement execution plan as a String. */
/** * Get the estimated row count for the number of rows returned by the associated query or statement. * @return The estimated number of rows returned by the associatedquery or statement. */
